card.name: Acastus Kolya
card.property: Each time you assign Acastus Kolya, you may pay 2 power. If you do, wound each assigned character. Failure: Destroy all assigned wounded support characters and incapacitate all assigned wounded team characters.

card.name: Chief Cowen
card.property: While Chief Cowen is assigned, your opponent gets: "Ready Chief Cowen - He is blocked until the end of the current mission." At the end of your next power phase, gain 1 power for each time Chief Cowen has been blocked this turn.

card.name: The Defiant One
card.property: While the Defiant One is assigned, your opponent must drain 1 to play or assign a character.

card.name: Hive Keeper
card.property: Each time you assign Hive Keeper, you may wound assigned characters twice. Failure: Choose one: incapacitate a wounded team character; or destroy a wounded support character.

card.name: "Michael"
card.property: Each time you assign "Michael", you may pay 2 power. If you do, your opponent must drain 4. For each hero card discarded this way, "Michael" gets difficulty +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Oberoth
card.property: While Oberoth is assigned, complications cost power -1 to play, and each complication counts as a Replicator card.

card.name: Steven Caldwell
card.property: During your turn (as the hero player), Steven Caldwell becomes an SCG support character. While Steven Caldwell is assigned, your assigned ships get firepower +1.

card.name: Wraith Queen
card.property: Each time you score Wraith Queen, you may pay 3 power. If you do, place an assigned support character into your villain score pile, and shuffle Wraith Queen into your deck instead.

card.name: Wraith Underling
card.property: While Wraith Underling is assigned, Wraith obstacles have dominion. Each time you score Wraith Underling along with a dominion obstacle, you may destroy that obstacle instead of scoring it. If you do, your opponent can't play more missions this turn.

card.name: Aiden Ford
card.property: Each time Aiden Ford becomes stopped, he gets a wound token. Destroy a wound token on Aiden Ford, drain 1 - He gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Chuck
card.property: Stop Chuck - Draw one card, then discard one card. Each time Chuck becomes ready, you may look at the top card of your mission pile, then place it on the top or on the bottom of that pile.

card.name: Evan Lorne
card.property: Each time you assign Evan Lorne, you may pay 2 power. If you do, wound an adversary. This ability costs power -2 if the adversary is assigned.

card.name: Janus
card.property: Stop and destroy Janus, destroy a gear or hero ship, incapacitate a ready team character - During your next debrief phase, discard your hand and do not draw any cards. When the turn ends, start another turn as the hero player.

card.name: Kate Heightmeyer
card.property: Stop Kate Heightmeyer, pay 3 power - Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each glyph they have.

card.name: Radek Zelenka
card.property: While Radek Zelenka is ready, each time you must drain 2 or more, you may pick one of the discarded cards, reveal it, and take it into hand. Each time you assign Radek Zelenka, you may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy all complications.

card.name: Richard Woolsey
card.property: Stop Richard Woolsey, pay 2 power - Take up to 4 random cards from your discard pile, and put them in any order on the bottom of your deck. This ability costs power -2 while he is assigned.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Success: Ready an Atlantis or SGC team character.

card.name: "Todd"
card.property: While "Todd" is ready or assigned, each time your opponent plays an obstacle, you may draw a card. If that obstacle is Wraith or Replicator, you may choose to drain 1 and gain 1 power instead.

card.name: Carson Beckett
card.property: While Carson Beckett is ready, he gets: "Pay 3 power, move a glyph from another character to Carson Beckett - Ready that character."

card.name: Elizabeth Weir
card.property: At the end of your power phase and debrief phase, you may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck for each Triangulum glyph Elizabeth Weir has, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Hermiod
card.property: Stop Hermiod - Ready a gear for each different glyph Hermiod has.

card.name: Jennifer Keller
card.property: Scorpius: Discard a card - Destroy all wound tokens on a wounded character. Libra and Scorpius, Stop Jennifer Keller, pay 3 power - Ready an incapacitated character (he is no longer incapacitated).

card.name: John Sheppard
card.property: Orion or Scorpius: Each time you assign an Atlantis character, you may discard a hero card from your hand. If you do, that character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Marshall Sumner
card.property: Each time another character earns a glyph Marshall Sumner has, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready both of them.

card.name: Rodney McKay
card.property: Orion: While Rodney McKay is ready, complications cost power +1 to play. LibraWhile Rodney McKay is assigned, obstacles cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Ronon Dex
card.property: Each time you assign Ronon Dex, you may wound an adversary. Gemini and Pisces, Stop a Particle Magnum gear, pay 2 power - Destroy an assigned adversary. If that adversary is wounded, this ability costs power -2.

card.name: Teyla Emmagan
card.property: Pisces: Teyla Emmagan gets skills +1 while at least one other Atlantis team character is assigned with her. Pisces and Orion: Each other Atlantis team character gets skills +1 while assigned with Teyla Emmagan.

card.name: Coup de Grace
card.property: Choose one: Destroy a wounded adversary; or choose a success text on a card at the current mission that will trigger an additional time if the mission succeeds.

card.name: Final Showdown
card.property: Your opponent chooses an adversary in their villain score pile that they could play. If there is one, they play that adversary from there immediately at no cost. If this event brought an adversary back into play, choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission, and you may ready and/or unblock them.

card.name: Gunboat Diplomacy
card.property: Until the end of the turn, Culture and Combat missions get difficulty -1 for each hero ship assigned to them.

card.name: Help Is on the Way
card.property: To play this event, you must stop a character. Search your deck for a support character, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. If the stopped character is wounded, this event costs power -2 to play.

card.name: Med Pack
card.property: Stop this gear and shuffle it into your deck - Destroy all wound tokens on a character.

card.name: Particle Magnum
card.property: Stop this gear - Wound an assigned adversary. You may pat 2 power. If you do, ready this gear. Stop this gear, pay 2 power - Block an adversary from the current mission.

card.name: Personal Shield
card.property: Place this gear face up beneath a character - While this gear is beneath a character, they can't be given wound tokens, and they get: "If this character would be destroyed or incapacitated, destroy this gear - Stop them instead".

card.name: Z.P.M.
card.property: At the end of each player's power phase, gain 1 power. This effect works even while you are the villain player. Destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Choose one: ready a hero ship, even if that ship is currently incapacitated; or ready all gears.

card.name: Blockaded Space Gate
card.property: Failure: You may place this obstacle on your assigned ship. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this obstacle. Return the blockaded mission if this obstacle is destroyed.) That ship is blocked while this obstacle is on it. Withdraw 2

card.name: Costly Strategy
card.property: Success: Your opponent must wound assigned characters a number of times equal to the current mission's experience.

card.name: Culling the Herd
card.property: Withdraw 2 For each wounded character assigned to the current mission, this obstacle costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Dart Raid
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) While this obstacle is in play, each time you assign a Wraith ship, you may wound a character.

card.name: Fatal Feeding
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) When you play this obstacle, you may destroy a wounded support character.

card.name: Feeding Frenzy
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Wound all assigned team characters; or incapacitate all wounded assigned team characters.

card.name: Hijacked Gate
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear or hero ship. Success: Your opponent can't play more missions this turn.

card.name: Invading Forces
card.property: While this obstacle is in play, each time it's your turn to act, add a counter on this card. Failure: You may look at the top X cards of your opponent's mission pile, where X is the number of counters on this card. If you do, place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Iratus Bug
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. As long as this card is on them, they are blocked and their owner gets: "Stop any number of characters with a total of 3 Science or more, or 3 Ingenuity or more - Destroy this card."

card.name: Left to Die
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may choose one: destroy a wounded support character; or stop a wounded team character; or wound a character.

card.name: Precarious Truce
card.property: Success or Failure: You may ready a Wraith adversary.

card.name: Prisoners of the Hive
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may pay 2 power. If he doesn't, he must drain 4.

card.name: Psychic Incursion
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses a number between 0 and 4, then drain X, where X is the chosen number. You may draw a number of cards up to 4 minus the chosen number.

card.name: Sabotaged Failsafes
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose one: you may stop a gear; or you may destroy a stopped gear.

card.name: Taken for Interrogation
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may wound an assigned character. Failure: You may wound assigned characters up to three times.

card.name: Wraith Armada
card.property: Failure: Ready up to X Wraith ships, where X is the current mission's experience.

card.name: Wraith Stun Weapons
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may incapacitate a wounded team character.

card.name: AR-1's Puddle Jumper
card.property: While this ship is assigned, it gets: "Stop this ship, pay 3 power - Ready and/or unblock a character. If that character is Atlantis, gain 1 power." Pay 3 power - This ship gets firepower +2 until the end of the mission. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Atlantis
card.property: Atlantis gets firepower +1 for each Z.P.M. gear you have. At the end of each mission, if Atlantis was assigned, incapacitate it. Victory: Choose two: You may destroy a villain ship; or you may destroy an obstacle; or you may destroy an adversary.

card.name: Daedalus
card.property: Victory: You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a character. You may immediately assign that character to the current mission.

card.name: Time Jumper
card.property: While Time Jumper is assigned, it gets: "Incapacitate Time Jumper, pay 3 power - The current mission ends immediately without resolution." (There is no ship battle, and the mission is neither a success or failure.)

card.name: Asuran Cruiser
card.property: Victory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, you may choose a failure text on a mission or Replicator card at the current mission that will trigger an additional time if the mission fails.

card.name: The Super-Hive
card.property: Each time you assign the Super-Hive, you may pay 2 power. If you do, search your deck for a Wraith card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. Victory: At the end of this turn, if your opponent's deck is empty, you win the game.

card.name: Wraith Cruiser
card.property: Wraith Cruiser gets firepower +1 for each other Wraith ship assigned to the current mission. Victory: You may choose a Wraith obstacle or a Wraith ship from your discard pile, reveal it, and take it into hand.

card.name: Wraith Dart
card.property: Wraith Dart gets firepower + 1 for each other Wraith ship assigned to the current mission.
